Articles.Content: okay i really hate to have to ask for something but im at my whits end trying to build this. can someone build me a cargo ssto that will carry into orbit pretty big cargo. like space station parts. the only requirements are that it cant use mechjeb to fly as i dont have it and will not install it, and that it doesnt use any mods other then B9, Novapunch, KW rocketry, or fuseteck stationparts. if possible please keep the no clipping or to a minimum. or what ever lets you put parts in parts cause it makes my laptop freak out. thanks to anyone that decides to make one. really really really am great full to you!!!

Check out this challenge and search for the "Utilitarian Commendation" : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/11214-The-K-Prize-100-reusable-spaceplane-to-orbit-and-back

If you're interested just for getting stuff to orbit you can check out the Bee SSTO in my signature

Okay, size is one thing. I can do that. What is the weight we are talking about here? Are we trying to lift a station core or a fuel tanker? In my case, that's >20 tons vs ~40 tons so it matters, a lot! Weight on an SSTO is at a premium. You specifically mentioned station parts, are we talking hab module or fuel tanker? There is a massive weight range in there and I need to know what we are lifting to actually guarantee results.

I'd say look at my threads. From 2.5mT to 25mT I've got SSTO's for all tastes. Some even come with their own space station modules already designed. But in my skunkworks thread there is a B9 shuttle with cargo bay that I think you will like the most. Very STS-esque, only SSTO.

Edited August 22, 2013 by Rune
Search "cargo ssto" on YouTube and select a guy called G4virus. He has like 15 cargo SSTOs built. There will be a download link for all of them in each of his vids. Enjoy.
Thanks for the ideas:) really nice to have people reply with something other then build it yourself noob!!
